Name: Searing Missile I
Desc: Summons 1 missile, <color=#9B372F>removing Swamp blocks and inflicting a medium amount of Combustible</color>, triggering the attack skill of the next chain.

Name: Searing Missile II
Desc: Summons 1 missile, <color=#9B372F>removing Swamp blocks and inflicting a medium amount of Combustible</color>, triggering the attack skill of the next chain.

Name: Searing Missile III
Desc: Summons 1 missile, <color=#9B372F>removing Swamp blocks and inflicting a medium amount of Combustible</color>, triggering the attack skill of the next chain.

Name: Lava Burst
Desc: Creates a cross-shaped Lava block. <color=#9B372F>Standing on it inflicts a small amount of Combustible and reduces the switch cooldown</color>, triggering the attack skill of the next chain.

Name: Inferno Strike
Desc: Summons an Explosive Projection that <color=#9B372F>attacks a single target and inflicts a large amount of Combustible</color>, triggering the attack skill of the next chain.

Name: Power Overload
Desc: <color=#9B372F>Significantly increases the size</color> of missiles, Lava, and Explosive Projections <color=#9B372F>in subsequent chains</color> (their damage remains the same).

Name: Unrelenting Will
Desc: <color=#9B372F>Significantly increases the damage</color> of missiles, Lava, and Explosive Projections <color=#9B372F>in subsequent chains</color>.

Name: Power Compensation
Desc: <color=#9B372F>Significantly increases the quantity</color> of missiles, Lava, and Explosive Projections <color=#9B372F>in subsequent chains</color>.
